mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, PRODUCTID, MANUFACTURE, ORDERNUM, INPORTPRICE, AMOUNT, INPORTTIME, ACTUALNUM, ACTUALPRICE, ACTUALAMOUNT, STOCKOPER, STOCKTIME, SLEVEL, STATUS, DESCR, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, NAME, SAVENUM, CORPID, OPENFLAG, MANUFACTUREID, GROUPID, REMARKS, RECEIVENUM, RETURNNUM, PAYFLAG, DISCOUNT1, DISCOUNT2, DISCOUNT3, DISCOUNT4, HAVEPAYED, NOTPAYED, PAYMENTTYPE, SEVENNUM, THREENUM, NINENUM, CREATOPER, CREATDATE, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, RESERVE11, RESERVE12, RESERVE13, RESERVE14, PRODUCTNAME, PURCHASEINDEXID, RESERVE15, UNITEFLAG, PURCHASEFLAG, SENDTIME, SHIPNUM, GIFTNUM, PAYMENTID, RECEIVEOPER, RECEIVETIME from DB_PURCHASE where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
